MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH5 postcode area of Connahs Quay, affecting properties in Princes Street, and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7:49 am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 12 Noon. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 9:00 am on 22nd January, 2021.
